name: Light the Way-10th Anniversary
description:
Originally released in 2012, Light the Way saw favorable success and ratings before being taken down in 2015. Now, for it's tenth anniversary, the game has been rebuilt from the ground up, sporting a fresh coat of paint and a handful of QOL improvements!

Light the Way brings a twist to the classic memory game genre! A sequence of tiles will light up across the playing grid. It is your job to memorize which tiles light up and the order that they light up in, then recreate said sequence. Sounds easy, but as you reach higher difficulties, the playing grid becomes larger and the sequences longer, testing how effective your memory truly is!

[KEY FEATURES]
-60 memory straining levels
-3 challenging difficulty levels
-Beautiful, simplistic design that keeps players in the game without distractions
-No timers! Play when you want for however long you want!
-Buy once with no restrictions in current and future content!

REVIEWS FOR THE ORIGINAL LIGHT THE WAY
**** This is a very fun game, and can be quite mind taxing. It's a fun twist on the memory game genre!

***** "Light the Way" is a great and fun game that will really work you to use your memory and proves old brains can learn new tricks. And researchers say that it is essential to preserve and improve brainpower and this game will deliver!

***** I absolutely love this game! The simplicity and music and just everything is just so well put together. Great job!

* Looks fun.
